title: Freelance Consultant
description: We are seeking an experienced Freelance Consultant to provide expert support on digital marketing, sustainability, and space sector initiatives. You will work on high-impact projects, advising on strategy, optimising campaigns, and delivering results on a flexible schedule that suits your availability.

title: Personal Assistant
description: Join us as a Personal Assistant to support the leadership team in managing schedules, coordinating projects, and ensuring smooth daily operations. You will be pivotal in keeping workflows efficient, facilitating communication, and supporting strategic priorities.

title: Intern
description: We are looking for a motivated Intern to gain hands-on experience in digital marketing, sustainability, and content creation. You will contribute to client initiatives, support campaigns, and learn industry best practices while developing practical skills for your future career.
